body_html:
I've got the same proble with Ubuntu 18.04+GeForce 1080Ti+nvidia-390+cuda-9.[012] and corresponding cuDNNs +tensorflow-1.11.0 .
My solution is to downgrade the tensorflow and tensorflow-gpu to 1.6.0 with cuda-9.0+CuDNN 7. It worked.

body:
I've got the same proble with Ubuntu 18.04+GeForce 1080Ti+nvidia-390+cuda-9.[012] and corresponding cuDNNs +tensorflow-1.11.0 .
My solution is to downgrade the tensorflow and tensorflow-gpu to 1.6.0 with cuda-9.0+CuDNN 7. It worked.
